sentences.english: My grandma is very good at weaving baskets with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 我的艿艿十分擅長用竹子編籃筐。

sentences.english: We've planning out an English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在準備編一部英漢字典。
編籃子這一行已逐漸衰弱。

sentences.english: Are you any good at making uy stories for children ?
sentences.chinese: 你擅長給孩子們編故事嗎？

sentences.english: Office facilities is made up change mechanism administration to make up general need to attend officeholder exam.
sentences.chinese: 機關事業編改成機關行政編一般需要參加公務員考試。

sentences.english: Office facilities is made up change mechanism administration to make up general need to attend officeholder exam.
sentences.chinese: 機關事業編改成機關行政編一般需要參加公務員考試。

sentences.english: Use all the sentences you've learned to make a conversation and write down.
sentences.chinese: 用所有學過的句型編一個對話並寫下來。

sentences.english: Right now I am writing my own "Pleasant Goat and Big Bad Wolf" story.
sentences.chinese: 我現在在自己編《喜羊羊與灰太狼》的故事。

sentences.english: After watching the red-dressed women walk by, I went to the rooftop and watched workers weave wastebaskets.
sentences.chinese: 看那羣紅衣女郎走過，我爬上屋頂看工人們編垃圾筐。

sentences.english: At this time of crisis, you can still weave straw sandals?
sentences.chinese: 都這個時候了，還有閒情編草鞋？

sentences.english: I think you can weave a story around this incident.
sentences.chinese: 我想你可以圍繞這一事件編一個故事。

sentences.english: There is no correct answer to this question, so you must make up your own story.
sentences.chinese: 對此問題沒有正確答案，因此你必須自己編故事。

sentences.english: Chinese Journal of Rock Mechanics and Engineering, English Version, Vol. 14, Supp.
sentences.chinese: 中國岩石力學與工程學會編。

sentences.english: The work of writing a dictionary begins with the reading of vast amount of materials and making of reading cards.
sentences.chinese: 編字典的工作是從閱讀大量材料做讀書卡開始的。

sentences.english: The teacher asked the children to some pomes about the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 老師要求孩子們編一些關於中秋節的詩。
